summary: The SBIR/STTR Website Improvement Act amends the Small Business Act to require federal agencies with SBIR (Small Business Innovation Research) or STTR (Small Business Technology Transfer) programs to collect and make publicly available additional information on award recipients. This includes details on research institutions subcontracted by awardees, specifying their location, type (e.g., higher education, nonprofit), and in the case of higher education institutions, whether they are designated as part B institutions, Hispanic-serving institutions, Tribal Colleges or Universities, etc. The bill also sets a deadline for updating the existing databases.
